summary: Executing script to record screen with 1920x1080 resolution at 30fps, using ffmpeg and python's pyscreenshot_output.py. Saving the video as 'video_record.mp4'.

details.comment: Executing script to record screen with 1920x1080 resolution at 30fps, using ffmpeg and python's pyscreenshot_output.py. Saving the video as 'video_record.mp4'.
